product_details_and_care:
Elegantly long and infinitely versatile, a simply styled cardigan is a go-to, lightweight layer in a fine-gauge knit spun from linen-blend yarns.
37" regular length (size Medium); 35" petite length (size Medium P).
Dark dye may transfer to lighter materials.
No closure.
Front patch pockets.
57% linen, 27% viscose, 16% polyester or 55% linen, 45% rayon.
Hand wash cold, dry flat.
